content: you will receive a pdf file with step-by-step instructions on how to make the winter blossom blanket size 4 sizes available skill level intermediate-beginner the pattern uses standard american terms yarn bernat blanket i would love to see your finished products tag me on instagram @cj dsgn and use the hashtag #andreasblanket refund there are no refunds on patterns resell finished product with pattern credit © 2024 cj design all rights reserved
